programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2010
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2010 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep1
programme.desc: Crazy Fast - Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep1
programme.desc: Ty And Revvit - Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep1
programme.desc: Little Trouble In Big China - It's the Lunar New Year and Odlulu has accidentally brought a stone dragon to life! Wally and Wenda work with local siblings Li and Liu, members of a dragon dance team, to tame the dragon and keep the celebration from being ruined.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1 Ep1
programme.desc: War And Trees / Trade Wreck - Audrey defends Tiny when the Bloogey Boys exclude him from the treehouse. The trading tree turns into havoc after the Harvey Girls try to get around the rules.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit - A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Chicken At Sea / The Key Master - Archibald hits the high seas to help out endangered turtles. It's Archibald to the rescue when the citizens of Crackridge report a series of thefts.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Nest - When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep27
programme.desc: Queen Of Police / Roidian Prom - When Tip takes over Kyle's job as "King of Police," she removes all rules from Boovsland and it descends into chaos; Tip and Oh accompany DieAnne to Roidian Prom

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter The Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep1
programme.desc: Wednesday - Just before her 15th Birthday. Princess Cleopatra is zapped thirty thousand years into the future where she discovers that she is the prophesied savior of the galaxy.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Wormhole / Ear Worm - Following the events of the “Branch Bum,” the Trolls become lost in a series of wormholes, each of which leads to a new and strange alternate world. The Snack Pack must work together in order to find their way back home/In order to psych the Snack Pack up for collecting the confetti from Confetti-fest, DJ Suki unveils the catchiest song ever written. But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends’ heads.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep27
programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 1 - Prince Barty and Princess Julienne, King Julien's needy and dramatic parents, must take over for their son when he's held captive on a pirate ship

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Frenzied Farts Of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The world’s worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep1
programme.desc: The Perfect Show/ Napoleon - Peabody & Sherman's first show goes off the rails when celebrity-seeking neighbors won't leave; Napoleon throws a temper tantrum to get his own dessert.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep1
programme.desc: Crazy Fast - Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep1
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 1 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter The Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The world’s worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep1
programme.desc: The Perfect Show/ Napoleon - Peabody & Sherman's first show goes off the rails when celebrity-seeking neighbors won't leave; Napoleon throws a temper tantrum to get his own dessert.

programme.title: Trollhunters Ep1
programme.desc: Becoming Part 1 - An average high school student, Jim Lake, yearns for adventure and he gets more than he bargained for when he inherits the mantle of Trollhunter after the previous Trollhunter is killed

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep1
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 1 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter The Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep1
programme.desc: Wednesday - Just before her 15th Birthday. Princess Cleopatra is zapped thirty thousand years into the future where she discovers that she is the prophesied savior of the galaxy.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Wormhole / Ear Worm - Following the events of the “Branch Bum,” the Trolls become lost in a series of wormholes, each of which leads to a new and strange alternate world. The Snack Pack must work together in order to find their way back home/In order to psych the Snack Pack up for collecting the confetti from Confetti-fest, DJ Suki unveils the catchiest song ever written. But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends’ heads.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep27
programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 1 - Prince Barty and Princess Julienne, King Julien's needy and dramatic parents, must take over for their son when he's held captive on a pirate ship

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Rupert’S Wild Scooter Ride - Rupert and his friends chase all over Nutwood when Ping Pong's spell accidentaly makes his scooter run away.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rupert And The Undersea Adventure - Undersea adventures when Rupert, Bill and Ping Pong have to rescue Miranda the Mermaid from the clutches of a Giant Clam.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep1
programme.desc: A Time To Be Quiet. A Time To Be Loud - Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet… not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep2
programme.desc: The Right Sound - One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep53
programme.desc: Compost Chaos - Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep54
programme.desc: Bumble'S Afraid Of The Dark - Primrose and Violet are having a sleepover. When Bumble admits that he is scared of the dark, the tots try everything to stop him from being afraid

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Edubot 4000 - Fed up with Dennis pulling the wool over Mrs Creechers eyes, Walter orchestrates a robot to take over Class 3C with disastrous results!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Dare Dennis - Dennis and the gang are suffering from dinner lady Olive’s completely inedible school dinners. In their mission to ‘drop the slop’, they discover a poster of her past career as a singer. Dennis’ eureka moment leads to asking her to join The Dinmakers - hoping she’d trade a life in the kitchen for the limelight. However after unleashing Olive’s inner diva their mission is to get Olive back into the kitchen!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep1
programme.desc: The New Alliance - A space explorer, previously thought lost in space, returns to Earth and joins four teenagers in a search for a giant alien robot lion

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep1
programme.desc: Stink Of Fear: Chapter One - When Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to Paris to enter a cooking competition, Fearless Leader sends super spies Boris and Natasha after Bullwinkle to steal his secret recipe

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep1
programme.desc: Crazy Fast - Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep2
programme.desc: Scrapadactyls - When Revvit and his Reptool friends venture out of their ravine, the Dinotrux band together to save them from a flock of savage Scrapadactyls.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Best In Show Bot / The Secret Of Madame Baroness - Archibald hides inside Loy's robot after accidentally breaking it. A lost boomerang leads to a job working for a fancy singer.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Dreadful Debacle Of Dj Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Cat’S In The Cradle - When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Baby’s doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays With Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Don'T Worry Be Peppy / Two'S A Cloud - When Poppy worries that her father doesn’t feel useful now that’s he’s no longer King, she asks her friends to bring Peppy small problems to solve. But will Peppy be able to face a real threat, in the form of a swamp monster?/When Cloud Guy moves into Branch’s bunker, Branch will do whatever it takes to get his unwanted roommate to leave- including inviting his annoying cloud parents over.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep2
programme.desc: School Of Hard Rocks - When teamed up with her new friend Lerk, Eep's competitive side takes over when she sets out to win the first-ever school hunting exam at any cost.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep2
programme.desc: Little Kisses / Snow Day - Tip busts Oh eating kitty litter and says he'll never get kissed by My Mom again./Oh and Tip help out all his friends when they freeze into Boovsicles.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lucky And The Treacherous Trail - When Lucky gets wind of an advanced trail ride she decides to become the best frontier girl anyone has ever seen.overnight

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Deep Trouble - Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep29
programme.desc: Why Wildebeest Stampede - You see there was a time when Wildebeest didn't stampede. They used to stand on the plains and munch grass all day. But there were so many of them and they were eating so much grass that all the animals had to do something about it. Tortoise realized that the Wildebeest weren't the brightest animals in Tinga Tinga and they always did whatever the last beast said. So the animals decided to tell the Wildebeest that ‘they were welcome to stay in Tinga Tinga and they must never RUN!' So what did the Wildebeest do? They ran and they ran and they RAN! So that's Why Wildebeest Stampede! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep30
programme.desc: Why Chameleon Changes Colour - You see there was a time when Chameleon wasn't bright and colourful at all. In fact Chameleon was rather dull and grey… like a rainy day. One day when all the animals are playing games and sheltering from the rains Chameleon decides to slip away because he feels boring. Butterfly comes across Chameleon sitting sadly on a rock and shows him a rainbow. Chameleon can't resist and stands on the Rainbow, and TA-DAH!! He turns red and yellow and pink and green! Chameleon soaks up all the colours of the magical rainbow and now, KAPOW!! Chameleon can be any colour he wants! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep29
programme.desc: The Case Of The Toyland Mischief Maker - When Big Ears' teapot goes missing, Noddy is surprised to find it hanging from a lamp post. And when Bumpy's kennel goes missing too, it's clear there's a mischief maker in Toyland. Noddy needs to investigate before Toyland descends into chaos. Using his investigating kit and with Revs and Bumpy to help, Noddy discovers that it was the Naughticorns playing a game of Dare and daring each other to do silly things. The Naughticorns apologise for creating mischief in Toyland and Noddy finds a way for everyone to play the dare game together – safely! Go, Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep30
programme.desc: The Case Of The Popping Balloons - Noddy and his friends are each given a balloon at the end of Smartysaurus's Science Party. But when lots of the balloons start going pop, Noddy decides to investigate why. Realising that someone must be hiding and popping them, he follows the clues to PatPat and then to the Naughticorns before eventually working out that the balloon poppers are the Ninjas. They've been playing their favourite game: Ninja-Balloon-Pop! Noddy helps them to see that while they were having fun, everyone else was getting upset. Back at the Dino-Lab, the Ninjas apologise and this time everyone happily joins in with a game of Ninja-Balloon-Pop. Case closed! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep29
programme.desc: How Can We Make The Most Beautiful Garden Ever? - Poor Mimi! Her normally beautiful garden is all messy and full of swirly piles of earth. She's really upset and Jess promises to her help her make it the most beautiful garden ever! Raking away the swirls doesn't work, they just come back! Jess and Mimi realise that worms are making the swirly piles of earth. Mimi wants to move them away but they go back underground before she can catch them. When it rains the worms come back and Jess and Mimi gather up the worms in a bucket and take them to live in the orchard by a patch of scrappy flowers. The garden still isn't looking at it's best though! After the worms have gone Mimi's flowers go all droopy. Willow explains that worms make help make the soil rich and good for plants – and that's what makes the flowers bloom. Jess remembers that the worms had come out when it rained. They water the ground to bring the worms up to the surface again. The worms agree to come back to Mimi's garden and soon her garden is beautiful again. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep30
programme.desc: Why Are There Little Hills In The Orchard? - Jess and the pups have been looking after the orchard while Willow's been on holiday but the day she's due back the orchard is full of little piles of earth. What's making them? That's the Big Question. Jess wonders if someone put them there. He asks Mimi, who's making a pile of earth while she digs a hole. She tells him she's going to plant an apple tree. Maybe someone's been planting new apple trees in the orchard thinks Jess. But when he looks carefully there are no holes or newly planted trees. Horace the hoppy frog suggests that maybe it's an invisible digger who's digging underground. Billie the little mouse arrives and tells Jess that the little piles of earth are called molehills. Jess works out that the piles of earth are in a line. Maybe someone is digging a tunnel underground so they can travel right across the orchard. They keep very quiet and a tiny mole pops out above ground. That's who's been making piles of earth in the orchard. They've answered the question. Hooray!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep2
programme.desc: Dungball Derby/Ace Of Race - When White Shadow is invited to play a daring sport against his hero, an athletic dung beetle, the crew is worried he doesn't know the game is fixed. // Chet gets taken by a con artist gecko and bets Turbo's shell. programme.desc: Rupert And The Star Child - Rupert, Bill and Raggety meet Astra, a star child who has fallen to earth, but she need their help to return to the starry sky as she's used up too much of her ‘twinkle'

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep3
programme.desc: Huffty Loses His Voice - Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa Finds A Voice - Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep3
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Flying Shark - Julian is very excited about the Sealife Awareness Day at Greendale School. While he's talking to Pat about it, his dad gets a call from Ben - a special delivery! Pat discovers it's a giant inflatable shark which is to be the surprise centrepiece of the Sealife day. But when Pat stops to help Alf mend a gate, a mix-up with parcel tape ends up with the whale accidentally inflating and floating off... Pat must use his ingenuity to catch the whale and - most important of all - deliver it in time for the special Sealife Awareness event...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep4
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Blue Flash - Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep55
programme.desc: Count On Fifi - Fifi and Bumble deliver lots of delicious honey to Poppy's stall. They lose a pot on the way and there isn't enough to go round. Can they find the missing pot, or will Stingo have to go without his honey for tea?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Pups Save the Balloon Pups / Pups Save the Spider Spies - Giant balloons floated away from a parade and it's up to the pups to save the pup balloons, the parade and Mayor Humdinger! // The Turbot cousins try to spot a rare spider, but get stuck in its web. It's up to the PAW Patrol save the spider spies!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bears / Pups Save a Farmerless Farm - Bears are asleep all over town! programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Pups Save a White Wolf / Pups Save a Wrong Way Explorer - After a sudden snow storm, Everest cares for a wolf cub as they work together to help the PAW Patrol find them. // Famous wrong-way explorer, Travelling Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole where they run into some crocodiles?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Pups Save the Squirrels / Pups Save a Roo - The PAW Patrol is on a roll when squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse causing it to fall onto Daring Danny's skateboard! // It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama. It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humsquatch / Pups Save a Far Flung Flying Disc - Travelling Travis yelps for help when he finds a mysterious creature in trouble. programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flying Kitty - Skye Kitty gets stuck beside an eagle's nest and needs help getting down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep501

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep414

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cat Burglar - It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep904
programme.desc: Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: The Cat Who Roared / Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: Pups and Cats Saving the Safe - Leo and Rory join the Paw Patrol on a visit to the jungle, and end up helping to rescue an injured baby monkey. / When Mayor Humdinger rebuilds Meow Meow to break into Mayor Goodway's new safe, the Cat Pack joins the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Pups Save a City Kitty - Cali gets lost in the woods.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew! - When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep822
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies / Pups Save the Green House - Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep702
programme.desc: Pups Save Election Day / Pups Save the Bubble Monkeys - When Mayor Humdinger runs for Mayor of Adventure Bay, his Mayor Mobile runs out of control, the Paw Patrol have to save the day! // Ryder and the Pups visit Tracker and Carlos in the jungle, a group of monkeys find themselves in sticky trouble!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep703
programme.desc: Pups Save an Antarctic Martian / Pups Save the Maze Explorers - Travelling Travis is on another great adventure when he lands in Antarctica but believes he's actually on Mars. // Mr. Porter and Alex go on a sightseeing hike but get trapped inside a huge maze! The Paw Patrol has to find the maze and their friends!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Pups Save a Waiter-Bot / Pups Stop a Pie-Clone - Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the café, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town! // Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies! The Pups must stop it before the town is covered.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep710
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Bad Bird Crew / Pups Save a Soapbox Derby - Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock. // Adventure Bay is holding a kids only soapbox derby race when a mysterious newcomer named ''Hum-Kid'' shows up and breaks the rules!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep711
programme.desc: Pups Save the Skydivers / Pups Save the Cupcakes - Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a day filled with Skydiving fun, but their adventure is quickly derailed. It's Paw Patrol to the rescue! // Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder, the Paw Patrol dives in to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep713
programme.desc: Pups Save A Lost Gold Miner / Pups Save Uncle Otis From His Cabin - Uncle Otis takes a trip to a lost gold mine. After wandering off course, Ryder and the Pups must save him from the booby-trapped mine. // Uncle Otis's installs a Smart Home 3000, in his cabin, that ends up trapping Uncle Otis and Mr. Wingnut inside!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep714
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater / Pups Save Ryder's Surprise - A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them. // Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep715
programme.desc: Pups Save the Marooned Mayors / Pups Save the Game Show - While out ice fishing in the North Country, Mayors Goodway and Humdinger, along with Chickaletta, get stuck in an ice crevasse. // The Wingnuts' farm plays host to a rootin' tootin Game Show hosted by Cowgirl Beryl!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art / Pups Save a Hot Potato - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep902
programme.desc: Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: Meow Meow Mayhem - When Mayor Humdinger transforms his robot cat Meow-Meow into a tiger-sized metal-eating menace, the Paw Patrol calls in the Cat Pack for help in the stopping the creature.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flying Kitty - Skye Kitty gets stuck beside an eagle's nest and needs help getting down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew - Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better then the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep903
programme.desc: Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: Rocket Rescuers / Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: Pups and Cats Save the Golden Mask - Cat-Pack members Wild and Shade team up with the Mighty Pups to stop a runaway rocket. / When the Ruff-Ruff Pack swipes a priceless golden lion mask from the museum, Shade and Wild must help the Paw Patrol to retrieve the stolen artifact

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep414
programme.desc: Pups Save the Runaway Kitties - The Kit-trastrophe crew get into the poufy shampoo and blow away

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups redden een gekke klimmer - Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save the duo.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck / Pups Save a Desert Flounder - Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! // Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up all the way out into the desert.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep721
programme.desc: Pups Save a Trash-Dinger / Pups Save the Royal Armor - Mayor Humdinger's trash-compacting truck is messing up the beach. It's up to Rocky's new Re-Use It Truck to help save a rescue! // Gift for the Princess been scattered all over town. It's up to Rocky's Re-Use It Truck to put her gifts back together!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups save Thundermouth / Pups Save a Class Pet - Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise. // Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster / Pups Save a Snowbound Cow - Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone. // When Bettina wanders up Jake's mountain and gets caught in a snowstorm, it's up to the Paw Patrol to bring her safely down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor / Pups Save a Magic Trick - Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep803
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rubble-Double / Pups Save a Clown - Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help. // The Pups must save Humdinger and his kittens when they mess around with Toodles the Clown's tiny clown car.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep804
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Cheetah - When the Cheetah swipes the Paw Patroller to fulfill her nefarious plan to destroy the jungle and build the cheating-est racetrack ever, the Paw Patrol must get a brand vehicle and stop her!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep805
programme.desc: Pups Save The Mustache / Pups Save the Funhouse - The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine. // When a carnival train gets stuck in a tunnel, it results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Mighty Pups: Pups and the Mighty Twins - Super-bandit, Ladybird, shrieks havoc in Adventure Bay taking all of the town's treasures - including Mayor Goodway! The Mighty Pups team up with new super pals, The Mighty Twins, to save the day - and the Mayor - in this super heroic adventure!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups Save a Giant Chicken / Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups Stop Harold's Deep Freeze - The Ladybird is back and Chickaletta has super powers! The Mighty Twins join the Mighty Pups to save a Giant Chicken and the town. // The Mighty Pups have to stop Harold Humdinger before he puts Adventure Bay in a deep freeze so he can become mayor.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups and the Big Twin Trick / Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups Save the Mega Mayor - The Ladybird is up to her old tricks again, but this time the Mighty Twins have a super trick of their own! // Mayor Humdinger finally gets super powers and it's a total cat-astrophe! The Mighty Pups are summoned to save the Mega Mayor from himself.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Charged Up: Mighty Pups Versus the Copycat - The Mighty Pups get Charged Up to take on new super-baddie, The Copycat. It'll take all new powers and gear to take down their most formidable foe to date.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Charged Up: Pups Stop a Big Bad Bot / Mighty Pups, Charged Up: Mighty Pups Versus the Dome - When Harold Humdinger uses a GIANT ROBOT to take Adventure Bay and make his OWN town, the Mighty Pups have to save the day! // The COPYCAT is BACK and Adventure Bay needs a Mighty Rescue when he traps the entire town under a GIANT DOME!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep701
programme.desc: Mighty Pups Charged Up: Pups Stop a Humdinger Horde / Mighty Pups Charged Up: Pups Save a Mighty Lighthouse - The Mighty Pups have to save the day when Harold makes a cloning machine! // Harold uses his super powers to turn Cap'n Turbot's lighthouse into a rocket! The Mighty Pups need to Charge Up and stop him!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways / Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants / Pups Save a Yodeler - Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole. // When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express / Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treasure Cruise / Pups Save Rocket Ryder - Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. // The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew! / Pups Save the Glasses - When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town. // Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups vs. A Neon Humdinger / Pups Save A Royal Painting - When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. // Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep812
programme.desc: Pups Save a Chicken Tulip / Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark - When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble. // The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Just Be Coo / Tee'd Off - When Sancho gets himself into trouble in the city, Sergio helps him become a model pet! // Worried that Lori may have a new crush, Bobby visits her in college and tries to impress her with his golf skills.

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Cow Power / I.T. Pony - Annie and Pony adopt a cow to replace Dad's smoke belching truck, but when it doesn't work out, it's impossible to get rid of. // Annie thinks Pony is a tech genius, until his app creation puts the population in peril.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Wylde Wex / Business is Booming - Dr. Wexler helps his unfrozen best friend Wylde adjust to a modern, one-year-later world. // Tired of living with her overbearing mother, Daisy starts her own business in order to buy a dynamite factory as a new hideout.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Make Over and Over / Lights ! Camera ! Grizzled ! - With the help of Harl Hubbs' giant crane, Ave Empire tries to put his "perfect" Opera House in the perfect spot. // Detective Sam Grizzled is hired as a consultant on a movie about a bank robbery he foiled in his early police days.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Allergic Reaction - While training for a TV baking competition with Eleanor, Theodore develops an allergy to an unknown ingredient.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Lice-enced to Teach - After a lice outbreak that closes the school, Dave sets up a classroom in the house acting as their teacher.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Animal House Party - When Derek overhears that Alvin and his brothers are alone for the weekend, he plans a wild party at their house.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Dr. Zap vs Electroboy - Theodore is hit by lightning and believes he's like his comic book hero, until he's told he's actually a villain.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep179
programme.desc: Extreme Sports / Squirrel Record - SpongeBob and Patrick try to join the extreme sports team The Drasticals. // Sandy finds a book of world’s records, and tries to break them all with SpongeBob’s help.

programme.title: Danger Force S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Captain Man Strikes Out - When Captain Man goes on strike because he refuses to pay for art that he destroyed on a mission, the Vice-Mayor hires a new hero to defend Swellview - Monsieur Man.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: Fairly Odder S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Show Off - Unable to impress her crush in the real world, Viv wishes Dimmsdale was like the show Riverpound, where princes fall for girls like her. Roy spitefully wishes Dimmsdale was like the show Action High and ends up getting captured by evil villain Vicky.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep207
programme.desc: An Udder Mess / Teacher's Fret - Ronnie Anne wins two tickets to Dairyland - but has to choose between her besties Sid and Lincoln for the day! // When Ronnie Anne finds out her dad is dating her teacher, she teams with Sid to break them up ASAP!

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Strife of the Party / Kernel of Truth - When Lola learns that Lana is planning their joint birthday, she does everything to stop it. // Lincoln and the Middle School Action News Team solve the mystery of the missing popcorn.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Kobayashi - As Gwyn struggles to find her role aboard the Protostar, Dal tests his leadership skills in the newly discovered holodeck.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep205
programme.desc: Whirlybrains / MermaidPants - SpongeBob and Patrick get hooked on the latest fad - flying Your own brain like a tiny drone! // When SpongeBob & Patrick play Mermaidman and Barnacleboy, it's all fun and games until their sworn enemies arrive!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep206
programme.desc: Unreal Estate / Code Yellow - When SpongeBob thinks he's allergic to his pineapple, Squidward offers to help find him a new home. // Squidward is getting a nose job at the local hospital, and SpongeBob tags along as moral support.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Sleepover / The 'B' Word - Parker has a sleepover for the first time and enlists Angus's help to make it as fun as possible. // Parker and Angus go the distance to try and give Russell a bath before her stench becomes destructive.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Read Aloud / Not a Loud - The family embarks on a reading challenge at the library but Lola refuses to participate. // When Lincoln discovers the first page of his baby book is blank, he worries his parents are hiding something.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Tripped! - Everyone in the family has been working hard to save up for a family vacation. But while road tripping to their destination, everything that can go for the family wrong does.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Slink or Swim / The Big Chill - When Bobby finds out Carl can't swim, he offers to show him the ways of the waves! // After begging Abuelo for some A/C, the cousins decide to earn some cash at the neighborhood fair.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Karma Chameleon / Team Effort - The Changs go on vacation, leaving Ronnie Anne and her cousins to look after Cam, the chameleon snake. // Ronnie Anne and her skate buddies work together to show their coach they can make a good team.

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Wallet / Locked Out - When Annie finds a lost wallet, she's determined to return it to its owner and prove she's a good person. // Annie and Pony get locked out of their building, and they can't seem to convince their neighbors to let them back in.

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Always Yes Annie / Sleepover - Pony bets Annie that she can't go a whole day without saying no. // Annie is determined to go to her first sleepover, but Pony's homesickness threatens to change that.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep70
programme.desc: Chimps Ahoy / Ghost Host - Sandy is worried her inventions won't satisfy her chimp beneficiaries. // The Flying Dutchman crashes at SpongeBob's house where he constantly scares, startles and surprises SpongeBob.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep51

programme.title: Chowder Ep2B/Ep22B/Ep12B/Ep42B

programme.title: Inspector Gadget Ep202B/Ep207B/Ep212B/Ep217B/Ep222B

Gadget heads to the park to interrogate the local foliage on the matter.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: Lifestyle Europe - We're off to the beer tents at Munich's Oktoberfest - this time, through the eyes of a waiter! Plus: glamping under starry skies. And, travelling through Europe in an electric campervan.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Faith Matters
programme.desc: Ulm Minster - The Tallest Church in the World. In the very center of Ulm, a city in southern Germany on the River Danube, stands the tallest church in the world. Its 161.53-metre-high steeple bears witness to the city’s glorious past as one of the most powerful and prosperous German cities in the Middle Ages.

programme.title: Shift
programme.desc: Shift 45/2021 - 3D printers cook up vegan steaks, robots bake pizzas and drones fly luxury foods out to yachts: how digitization is changing our eating and nutritional habits.

programme.title: Global 3000
programme.desc: The Globalization Program - In South Africa, the population and the economy are struggling to cope with drastic power cuts. Meanwhile in Brazil, many children and teenagers dropped out of school during the pandemic.

programme.title: Tomorrow Today
programme.desc: The Science Magazine - Lunar research: Astronaut Alexander Gerst tells us why exploring the Moon is so important. And: Superconductive materials have amazing properties, so why have they only been used in basic research to date?

programme.title: World Stories
programme.desc: The Week in Reports - The situation is still critical in many of the liberated parts of Ukraine. The Russian shelling continues, and people are suffering; the State Ballet in Berlin dances on the deck of a moving ship, a great challenge for the dancers.

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: The Magazine for Africa's Youth - In this week’s show, Edith Kimani asks teen moms how pregnancy changed their lives. A teenage father in Kenya shares the struggles of parenting and we meet a young Namibian woman who escaped child marriage. We also meet a dancer who is using her art form to demand respect for modern working women. Plus, we discover the latest wedding trend in Uganda: Choreographed line dancing!

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Eco Africa
programme.desc: The Environment Magazine - This week on Eco Africa we find out how Rwanda is improving groundwater management and building up climate resilience, look at Germany’s meat substitute boom and at flowerpots made from discarded monitors in Cameroon.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Sports Life
programme.desc: Chainsaw Queen - Alrun Uebing has a passion: cutting wood with an ax and with a chainsaw. Yes, it's a sport. Yes, it’s competitive. Uebing has been crowned European champion. And she’s broken a world record - for men. At the German Championships, the 49-year-old wants to win the last title that she hasn’t already won. Sports Life accompanies Alrun Uebing to the competition.

programme.desc: NHK World-Japanpresents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japans flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Mitsuta Haruo is the only craftsman in Japan specializing in "jizai okimono" - meticulously made, highly articulated metal figures of animals such as insects and crustaceans. He talks about his craft.

programme.title: Journeys In Japan
programme.desc: In Wakasa-cho (Fukui Pref.), traditional Obon rituals welcome back the spirits of the ancestors in midsummer. On this program, get to know the real Japan and discover useful travel tips.

programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep10
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep7
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dern vs. Yan
programme.desc: Prelims - With wins in five of her last six bouts, a stretch that has seen her defeat Tecia Torres and score Performance of the Night victories over Nina Nunes, Randa Markos and Hannah Cifers, Mackenzie Dern is on the verge of entering the strawweight title race, but to get there, she has to defeat China’s Yan Xiaonan in the main event of UFC Fight Night on October 1 at the APEX in Las Vegas. Owner of wins over Angela Hill, Karolina Kowalkiewicz and Claudia Gadelha, Yan has proven to be a top contender at 115 pounds, but now she will meet her toughest test yet in the decorated jiu-jitsu black belt who is hungry to make her way to the top of the division

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dern vs. Yan
programme.desc: Main Event - With wins in five of her last six bouts, a stretch that has seen her defeat Tecia Torres and score Performance of the Night victories over Nina Nunes, Randa Markos and Hannah Cifers, Mackenzie Dern is on the verge of entering the strawweight title race, but to get there, she has to defeat China’s Yan Xiaonan in the main event of UFC Fight Night on October 1 at the APEX in Las Vegas. Owner of wins over Angela Hill, Karolina Kowalkiewicz and Claudia Gadelha, Yan has proven to be a top contender at 115 pounds, but now she will meet her toughest test yet in the decorated jiu-jitsu black belt who is hungry to make her way to the top of the division

programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep507AdrianYanezCubSwansonJoeLauzon
programme.desc: Adrian Yanez opens up about the loss of his father and coach and how tragedy shaped him into become a better fighter and father. Cub Swanson reflects on his hall-of-fame fight with Doo Ho Choi. UFC lightweight Joe Lauzon lists his top 5 favourite fights from his extensive UFC career.
